price: Sesungguhnya orang-orang mukmin, orang-orang Yahudi, Ṣābi`īn, dan orang-orang Nasrani, siapa saja431 (di antara mereka) yang benar-benar beriman kepada Allah, hari kemudian, dan beramal saleh, maka tidak ada kekhawatiran terhadap mereka dan tidak (pula) mereka bersedih hati.
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلَّذِينَ ءَامَنُواْ وَٱلَّذِينَ هَادُواْ وَٱلصَّٰبِـُٔونَ وَٱلنَّصَٰرَىٰ مَنۡ ءَامَنَ بِٱللَّهِ وَٱلۡيَوۡمِ ٱلۡأٓخِرِ وَعَمِلَ صَٰلِحٗا فَلَا خَوۡفٌ عَلَيۡهِمۡ وَلَا هُمۡ يَحۡزَنُونَ

version.title: Indonesian Translation - King Fahd Complex
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Indonesian by approved Committee by Indonesian Ministry of Islamic Affairs. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna alladhīna āmanū wa-alladhīna hādū wal-ṣābiūna wal-naṣārā man āmana bil-lahi wal-yawmi al-ākhiri waʿamila ṣāliḥan falā khawfun ʿalayhim walā hum yaḥzanūna
